concept.title: Room Characteristics and Features
concept.shortdesc: What can you expect from an AirClassroom rental?

section.title: Computers
section.p: Shanks Hall rooms 360 and 180 are equipped with iMac desktop computers, ideal for academic use. These computers are pre-loaded with software ranging from Adobe Creative Cloud and MS Office, to GarageBand. Feel free to load your own programs and files onto the computers, but unless you save on a personal hard drive your files will be erased when the computer shuts down.

section.title: Overhead Projector
section.p: There is an overhead projector in both Shanks 360 and 180. Please see the page titled "Setting up the Overhead Projector" for information on how to set up the projector. This machine is very useful for presentations, projects and more. Please make sure the projector is turned off when you finish using it!

section.title: Wi-Fi
section.p: By renting a classroom with AirClassroom, you will have access to the Virginia Tech Wi-Fi server. Each time you rent, we provide you with unique login information. This username and password will only be active for the duration of your reservation, and will grant you access to the Internet. We ask that you please use it responsibly, and always be careful of harmful files or viruses.
